description: The Sloe Gin&nbsp;Fizz Recipe is one of the most popular cocktails to serve during this holiday season. The recipe contains lemon juice, sugar syrup, and gin. It's perfect for drinking with friends and family as you celebrate the holidays!
name: Sloe Gin Fizz

recipeInstructions.name: Combine the sloe gin, lemon juice, and sugar syrup and shake in a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine the sloe gin, lemon juice, and sugar syrup and shake in a cocktail shaker filled with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: When the shaker becomes slightly frosty outside, strain the mixture into the glass.
recipeInstructions.text: When the shaker becomes slightly frosty outside, strain the mixture into the glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Top with sparkling water and gently stir.
